name: Python Dependency Security Assistant
description: An agent that scans Python packages for security vulnerabilities, typosquatting, and other security issues

tools.name: vulnerability_scan
tools.description: Scans a Python package for known security vulnerabilities

tools.name: dependency_chain
tools.description: Analyzes the complete dependency tree of a package

tools.name: name_similarity
tools.description: Detects potential typosquatting attempts by checking package name similarity

tools.name: package_reputation
tools.description: Checks the reputation and trustworthiness of a package

tools.name: final_answer
tools.description: Formats and presents the security analysis results
